name: Attack of the Time Gobbler - 2 Plane Flying
name_original: Attack of the Time Gobbler - 2 Plane Flying
description:
An experimental game imagining a 3D space, using two 2D perspectives. This game was made in under 48 hours for the United Game Jam 2020, guided by the theme of "two".

The game uses two different camera perspectives, two planes of movement, two levels, each at two minutes long, uses two colours to guide the player and was made by two people.

We are both beginners with no previous uploads on itch, alongside this being our first Jam (we had a great fun, thanks for organising!)

Sound effects used came from The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection by Juhani Junkala - https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

The music used was made by Role Music - https://freemusicarchive.org/genre/Chiptune

All artwork was expertly hand crafted by ourselves.
